reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sports bra comfortable, well-made, and good value for money, appreciating its color variety. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some say it's great, others find it too snug and runs small. The support and strap stability also get mixed reviews, with some saying the straps stay put all day while others report they keep sliding down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great and I will buy them again!
items.body: These came up as a suggestion of something I should review and I though... Sure! I am really happy with these! I bought them a couple years ago now and the black one and the white one still look and feel brand new, as if I just took them out of the package in the last week or so. The ones I wear the most often are getting a little worn but have held together very well. Mainly the are discolored and curl a bit around the edges but they do their job just as well now as the day I bought them. So not only are these some of the most comfortable bras I have had, but they are durable, having lasted this long with no plan to be replaced soon, they are forgiving of mistreatment since my husband took over laundry and does odd things that I will never mention because I am just so happy he is doing laundry, and they work perfect with all of the different types of things I do in my day. One of the biggest problems I have in general is that I don't want things to be too tight because that hurts but I don't like it when the bra is too loose around my ribs so my things start oozing out the bottom of the bra. These bras have neither of those problems. They are tight enough to keep things in place but loose enough that I am not in a lot of pain at the end of the day. If you are larger breasted like I am than you will probably take the pads out immediately. That is one down side. The pads looked like these comical little triangle on the the tips of these honkin' mound of flesh and it is just so silly looking. So I take them out. I mean it looks like if you had a bag of pizza dough rising against a cloth sack but a Dorito got stuck between the dough and the bag... no coverage at all because they don't make them any different size than the small ones, they just throw the same pads in every size. I totally recommend them though and when I need to buy more I will come right back here! Read more
items.author: MEAP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT Bras!!!
items.body: Nice bras!! Finally found a brand I love !!! Comfy and supportive and love straps run along shoulders so they don’t show with tops. In my opinion they run small. I ended up getting Size 14 and I’m pretty small boned and not huge breasts. may try even bigger. Read more
items.author: Shelley C

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sports bras, but the padding inserts really aren't needed
items.body: These are good, comfortable sports bras in a variety of attractive colors and overall they look and fit quite nice, too. I just find that the typically included foam inserts, especially with a chest my size, to be completely unnecessary and a pain to have to deal with—so the first thing I did was to pull them out and toss 'em. Afterward, the bras fit just fine...until I lost enough weight for them to become loose on me, oh well. (A 'me' problem, not this product, I just needed to buy more at a smaller size.) Read more
items.author: BeccaM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT BRAS, SO SOFT, SEE EDIT AT END!!! PLS READ!
items.body: I was on the fence about buying this product, but I’m surely glad I bought them! As a fit guide my bra size is 48D, and I bought the in a 3x. THEY FIT ME PERFECTLY!!! ADDITIONALLY , THE STRAPS SIT IN JUST THE RIGHT PLACE, AS THEY DO ARE IN JUST THE RIGHT PLACE ALONG MY BACK. THESE BRAS ARE VERY SOFT AND ARE NOT SCRATCHY IN ANY WAY. I ALSO LIKE THE EXTRA MATERIAL UNDER THE BUST BECAUSE IT ABSORBS ANY SWEAT UNDERNEATH. THE BREASTS DO TEND TO SWEAT WHEN YOU ARE WARM BECAUSE OF THE SKIN ON SKIN FACTOR, WHICH NOBODY CAN AVOID. THERE IS A PAD IN THESE BRAS THAT I LOVE BECAUSE EVEN IF YOUR NIPPLES ARE HARD, YOU CAN NOT DETECT THAT BECAUSE OF THE PAD. IF YOU DONT CARE FOR THE PAD, THEY ARE REMOVABLE. THESE BRAS ARE SUPER SOFT AND SO COMFORTABLE. THEY ARE NOT SCRATCHY AT ALL. THE SOFTNESS REMAINS EVEN AFTER WASHING THEM. THE MATERIAL IS NOT ONLY SOFT, BUT THE SEAMS ARE PERFECT, THERE ARE NO HOLES, AND THERE ARE NO STRINGS. THESE BRAS CAN BE USED AT THE GYM, IR FOR EVERYDAY. I AM SO HAPPY WITH THIS FIND THAT I AM PURCHASING ANOTHER SET!!! I RECOMMEND THESE BRAS VERY HIGHLY. EDIT 6/24/25…. THESE BRAS HAVE HELD UP EXCELLENTLY!!! PLEASE BUY WITH HESITATION IR RESERVATION. A++++++ Read more
items.author: DCat

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but annoying
items.body: These bras are comfortable, the color doesn’t run & offer good support and coverage. The loss of stars is due to the fact that the pads in the bra cups move around SIGNIFICANTLY in the wash. Sometimes both pads end up on one side, or the pads end up folded in half and/or lumpy. It is a major annoyance to stop and adjust each bra when folding laundry. You have to stand there and manipulate the pads into place. Sometimes, you can’t get the lumps completely out of the cups & then can only wear the bras with a thick shirt or sweater. This is a major design flaw. I’ve tried drying & not drying these; makes no difference. The opening between the cups should be sewn closed, and the pads need to be sewn in place as well. Read more
items.author: RH CC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way small
items.body: Run very very small order up people if you think you're a large order an XL Read more
items.author: singer54

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well despite wearer having a large cup size relative to band size.
items.body: I love mine! They're a tiny bit tight, but not uncomfortable. I worry if I go up a size, they will be too big. (For reference, I usually wear 32DDD) I wear them all the time and they're still holding up great. I definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Weger Moise

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 5 Pack: Black Grey Ink Blue Orchid Truffle, 3 Pack: Turquoise Orchid Pink, 4 Pack:black*2 Beige*2, 4 Pack: Turquoise Orchid Merlot Pink, 4 Pack:white*2 Beige*2, 6 Pack: Black White Nude Ink Blue Orchid Truffle, Black, 3 Pack: Navy Aqua Merlot, 5 Pack:black White Beige Red Purple, 8 Pack:pack of 8 Colors, White, 3 Pack: Ink Blue Orchid Truffle, 6 Pack: Black White Grey Navy Aqua Merlot, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
